entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of light snow before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
